channel.title: International on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in International on The Majority

item.title: Beware strangers bearing gifts
item.description: I want to be a part of an America that continues to stand up for all of us, not bail on all our friends across the country. Mayor of Los Angeles, Eric Garcetti.  In the wake of the American elections, there has been increasing talk about where a Biden presidency would stand on Scottish secession. The short answer: it will be unchanged from Obama in 2014 and all modern US presidents.
